item.title: Trump can deploy National Guard troops to Portland, appeals court says
item.description: Oregon attorney general urges the full appeals court to review the decision, while governor says “fight is not over.”

item.title: Biden completes a course of radiation therapy for prostate cancer
item.description: Former president’s spokesperson confirms Biden “rang the bell,” a tradition in cancer facilities to mark major milestones for patients, at the Philade...

item.title: White House begins demolishing East Wing facade to build Trump’s ballroom
item.description: The president had claimed construction of the $250 million ballroom wouldn’t ‘interfere’ with the existing White House structure.

item.title: Marines investigating errant live-fire blast over California’s I-5

item.title: Trump touts rare-earths deal, submarine pact with Australia ahead of Xi meeting
item.description: The White House has criticized China’s efforts to limit access to materials and minerals needed for manufacturing.
